name: Missile Command Remake (Fifolo)
description:
Information

Missile Command is a remake of 1980 game published by Atari. In the game you control missile launcher to counter enemy projectiles coming at all six of your cities. It's a round-based game, with difficulty increasing each round. How many can you survive?

Controls

Right click where you want your projectile to go. Press "Esc" to pause and unpause.

Platform

The game playable in browser.

Current status

This project is in very early development phase and I do not know if I am going to keep working on it (that will depend on a feedback and  ideas for the game). Also, I haven't yet added any good looking graphics so for now the game is not very "visually appealing" :D

Feedback

Please, write any suggestions, thoughts, ideas as well as constructive criticism that you have for the game, thanks!
